EmailTemplate.name: JetCity.DU-875 w/ HAPP.DU-875
EmailTemplate.subject: RE:The DU-875 Upgrade for Learjet is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THE DU-875 UPGRADE FOR LEARJET 40/45 FROM JETCITY
Throw out your 25-year-old CRT displays and upgrade your pilot's view of the sky with new DU-875 LCD displays featuring Primus Elite Advanced Features. Unlike many other displays, the DU-875 upgrade is built to fit your existing system and add life to your cockpit for years to come.
And the best part? The DU-875 upgrade doesn't require additional pilot training or modifications to the cockpit. Upgrade your displays and get the latest features that come with the DU-875 upgrade path by JetCity at no additional cost.
- 3D terrain, obstacle and runway data - Traffic Alert and Collision Avoidance System - Meteorological Terminal Aviation Routine Weather Report (METARs) and Terminal Aerodrome Forecast (TAFs)
HAPP OFFER: When you upgrade all four of your display units, you can save big on your new or existing HAPP plan. Learn more about the DU-875 upgrade and Primus Elite Advanced Features to see how JetCity can clear up your view of the road ahead.
